# m_name

**Instance Property**

The name of the selector value.

## Declaration

```swift
OSSharedPtr<OSString> m_name;
```

## Accessing Description Properties

- **m_value**: The control value matched by this description.
- **IOUserAudioSelectorValue**: The type of values managed by a selector control.
